attributes.action: Carers Reacting Against Poverty (C.R.A.P.) Pay Carers A Living Income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foster Carers choose to foster and get paid more than Carers who are forced into a Caring role and then are exploited by government setting a pathetic level of Carers Allowance.

UK Carers say pay Carers what they are worth not the least that can be got away with
